modName: The Great Book of Alchemy -Now in 4 volumes-
summary: This mod adds a book with all the alchemy recipes to see in game.
descriptionHtml:
Hi, this mod adds a book with all the alchemy recipes to see in game.                        
----Version one book---
To get the book you must add this command via console:

  player.additem 0002e666 1

----Version 4 volumes-----

To get the books you must add this command via console:

 -Healing and restoration............ player.additem 0002e666 1           
 -Fortifications........................player.additem 0002e667 1           
 -Alteration and Resistances.........player.additem 0002e668 1           
 -Poisons..............................player.additem 0002e669 1  

   
-Installation
  Copy the file \"The-Great-Book-of-Alchemy.esp\" in your data folder:
      C:\\Program Files> Steam> SteamApps> Common> Skyrim> Data
  or C:\\Program Files(x86)> Steam> SteamApps> Common> Skyrim> Data

-Uninstall
  Delete the files \"The-Great-Book-of-Alchemy.esp\" inside the folder:
  Skyrim> Data>


----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Spanish Version: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2737
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: Gyo
